verbs.description: After [ARG0: MSNBC] [V: spent] [ARG1: four hours] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARG2: breathlessly promoting what turned out to be a false story that federal investigators had been “ wiretapping ” President Trump ’s personal attorney Michael Cohen for months] , NBC ’s Today show on Friday only managed 41 seconds of air time to correct the phony bombshell .
